serviceData.title: Comprehensive Roofing Solutions in Denver, CO
serviceData.p: Heights Roofing specializes in residential and commercial roofing across Denver, CO. We provide licensed, insured crews, manufacturer-backed materials, and transparent quotes. From asphalt shingle installs to metal roofing systems and ongoing maintenance plans, we handle every job with attention to safety, code compliance, and long-term performance.

lists.title: Asphalt Shingle Roof Installation
lists.shortDescription: Durable, cost-effective residential roofing using architectural and laminated asphalt shingles.
lists.description:
• Material: Architectural (laminated) asphalt shingles — 30, 40, and 50-year options

  • Benefits:

    • Affordable and widely available color and style options

    • Good wind and hail resistance when paired with proper underlayment

    • Quicker installation and simpler future repairs
lists.h2: What Is Asphalt Shingle Roofing in Denver, CO
lists.p2: Asphalt shingle roofing is the most common residential roof system in Denver, CO thanks to its balance of cost, durability, and aesthetics. Heights Roofing performs full roof tear-offs or overlay installs with industry-standard underlayment, ice & water shield in vulnerable areas, proper ventilation, and ridge/cap solutions. Call [phone] to schedule a complimentary roof inspection and estimate.
lists.tyesHeading: When Do You Need a New Asphalt Shingle Roof in Denver, CO?
lists.overViewContent:
• What We Don't Cover (Examples):

    • Interior water damage remediation (we repair the roof and document damage for claims)

    • Asbestos removal or hazardous-material abatement

    • Structural framing replacement beyond local code-specified repairs (we provide referral partners)

What's Included:

  • Complete roof tear-off (if selected) or preparation for overlay

  • Roof deck inspection and localized replacement as needed

  • Ice & water shield, underlayment, starter, shingles, ridge cap, flashing, and cleanup

  • Final inspection and warranty paperwork

Typical Project Details:
Average install time: 1–3 days (depends on home size and weather)
Common warranties: 10-year workmanship, manufacturer shingle warranties (30–50 years)

leftSection.title: Commercial Roofing Services
leftSection.description: We also install low-slope systems and commercial asphalt options for retail, multi-family, and light industrial buildings.

rightSection.title: How to Select the Right Roofing System
rightSection.description: Consider your budget, roof slope, expected lifespan, and local weather (snow, hail, wind). We provide free consultations to match material and ventilation to your home's needs.

lists.comapreHeading: What to Expect with Asphalt Shingle Roofing
allowedItems: Full roof inspection and written estimate
Starter, underlayment, and ice & water shield in valleys/eaves
Architectural shingle installation and ridge cap
Metal flashing and step flashing at chimneys/vents
prohibitedItems: Interior drywall repair and content restoration
Permit fees in some jurisdictions (may be passed through)
lists.idealHeading: Ideal Projects for Asphalt Shingle Roofing:
idealProjects: Full roof replacements for single-family homes
Homes seeking a mid-range cost / lifespan balance

lists.description:
• Material: Standing seam, corrugated, or exposed-fastener metal panels in steel, aluminum, or copper

  • Benefits:

lists.h2: Commercial & Residential Metal Roofing Solutions in Denver, CO
lists.p2: Metal roofing is a premium option for Denver homeowners and businesses who want longevity and a modern aesthetic. Heights Roofing installs standing seam and panel systems with factory-painted finishes, certified fasteners, and engineered flashing to meet local wind and snow load requirements. Call [phone] to discuss metal roof options and receive a project timeline and estimate.
lists.tyesHeading: Why Choose Metal Roofing in Denver, CO?
lists.p3: Extremely durable | Fire-resistant and Class A-rated options | Long warranties available | Energy-efficient reflective finishes | Low maintenance
lists.seoContent:
Durable Metal Roofing Installation in Denver, CO

Looking for a long-term roofing solution? Heights Roofing installs standing seam and metal panel roofs designed for Denver's climate. Metal roofs offer excellent wind, snow, and hail performance, plus modern style options. Call [phone] to schedule a material review and estimate.
lists.overViewContent:
• What We Don't Install:

    • Non-code-compliant retrofit systems without structural evaluation

    • Metal roof coatings over severely rusted panels (we recommend replacement)

    • Contact us for custom historic metal roof preservation.

What's Included:

  • Precision layout and panel fastening

  • High-quality flashing, ridge and eave details

  • Finished trim and gutter/edge integration

Typical Project Details:
Panel widths and seam styles vary by product; project lead times may be 1–3 weeks for material ordering
Warranties: 20–40 year paint and weathertight warranties (manufacturer dependent)

leftSection.title: Residential & Commercial Metal Options
leftSection.description: We offer standing seam for modern residential projects and heavier-duty profiles for commercial buildings.

rightSection.title: How to Select the Right Roofing System
rightSection.description: We evaluate roof pitch, building structure, budget, and desired lifespan to recommend metal vs. asphalt vs. alternative systems.

lists.comapreHeading: What to Expect with Metal Roofing
allowedItems: Metal panel or standing seam installation
Custom flashing, gutters, and trim integration
Snow guards and ventilation planning (as needed)
prohibitedItems: Historic copper or specialty metal patination (quoted as custom work)
Structural upgrades beyond minor decking replacement (quoted separately)
Interior cosmetic repairs after water intrusion
idealProjects: Modern architectural homes seeking standing seam
Commercial buildings requiring durable low-maintenance roofs
Properties in high-wind or heavy-snow neighborhoods
Projects prioritizing energy efficiency and longevity

lists.h2: Reliable Roof Repair & Maintenance in Denver, CO
lists.p2: Heights Roofing provides same-day emergency tarping, detailed leak diagnostics, hail and wind-damage repairs, and routine maintenance plans to keep your roof performing. Our crews document damage for insurance claims and provide photo reports after every visit. Call [phone] for emergency service or to schedule a maintenance inspection.
lists.p3: Emergency tarping | Leak detection and repair | Flashing and chimney repairs | Gutter and downspout service | Preventive maintenance plans
lists.seoContent:
Professional Roof Repair & Maintenance in Denver, CO

From small leaks to post-storm restoration, Heights Roofing offers reliable repair services and proactive maintenance to protect your home. Our certified technicians provide transparent pricing and repair scopes. Call [phone] to request emergency service or schedule routine maintenance.
lists.overViewContent:
• What We Don't Perform:

    • Interior mold remediation or water-damage reconstruction (we coordinate with specialists)

    • Asbestos abatement or hazardous material removal

    • Unlicensed structural framing replacements (we provide referrals)

What's Included:

  • On-site diagnostic with moisture and thermal checks (when required)

  • Temporary emergency protections (tarping) and a written repair estimate

  • Repair completion, debris removal, and post-repair photos

Typical Response:
Emergency tarping: same-day when available; standard repairs: 1–7 days based on scope
Maintenance plans: biannual inspections recommended for high-snow or older roofs

leftSection.title: Insurance Claim Assistance
leftSection.description: We document damage and provide itemized estimates to support homeowner insurance claims and adjuster meetings.

rightSection.title: How to Select the Right Repair Approach
rightSection.description: We assess leak source, remaining shingle life, and structural condition to recommend repair vs. full replacement.

lists.comapreHeading: What to Expect with Repair & Maintenance
allowedItems: Leak localization and targeted shingle/flash replacement
Flashing repair or replacement around chimneys, vents, and skylights
Gutter cleaning and minor downspout repairs
Written repair estimates and photo documentation
prohibitedItems: Interior water-damage remediation and mold removal
Major structural rebuilds without separate engineering and permit plans
Unlicensed DIY work billed as professional repairs
lists.idealHeading: Ideal Projects for Roof Repair & Maintenance:
